Install smoke and carbon monoxide detectors in your home to alert you to the presence of smoke and carbon monoxide in case of a fire.
Use a fire blanket to create a barrier between you and the fire. A fire blanket can be used to smother a small fire or to create a safe space to escape to.
Keep a fire extinguisher in your car trunk in case you need to use it to put out a small fire while driving.
Keep a fire extinguisher in your office or workplace in case of a fire emergency.
Keep a fire extinguisher in your gym or sports facility in case of a fire emergency.
